short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Offers tools for Publishers of the Asset Store, such as notifications for Reviews (Updateds and News) and Sales.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension offers some tools or utilities for Asset Store Publishers. Among these utilities are...

- Viewing new or updated Reviews within the Extension
- New Sales notifications
- New Refunds notifications
- New Chargebacks notifications
- New Reviews notifications
- New Updated Reviews notifications
- etc

* This extension does not gain access to your Cookies, or personal data. Whenever this extension makes a request, it instructs the browser to use the Cookies it already has, for Unity API services. You only need to enter your Publisher ID and your RSS Link for Reviews.

* [GitHub] https://github.com/marcos4503/publisher-tools-for-assetstore
